bundle.shortDescription: Secure launcher and patcher for PvP Scalpel, keeping the desktop app and World of Warcraft addon in version lockstep.
bundle.longDescription: PvP Scalpel is a secure desktop launcher, patcher, and integrity layer designed for competitive World of Warcraft PvP. It ensures the desktop application and in-game addon always remain in version lockstep, verifies installation integrity, and prevents mismatched or outdated builds from launching. Built with Tauri for performance and security, PvP Scalpel provides a reliable entry point for players who depend on accurate data, strict versioning, and stable updates.
